Exceptions[edit | edit source]

  • Spiders are found through-out Morytania, notably within the Haunted Woods. They attempt to follow players and summon Feral Vampyres to attack players who get too close.

==Exceptions==
* Spiders are found through-out [[Morytania]], notably within the [[Haunted Woods]]. They attempt to follow players and summon [[Feral Vampyre|Feral Vampyres]] to attack players who get too close.
